title: ‘He’s Still Talking!’ At GOP Hearing, RFK Jr.’s Conspiracies Take Center Stage
description: Republicans have largely failed to delve into concrete abuses by federal agencies, instead bringing in witnesses who have provided little information and have been criticized for spreading conspiracy theories.

title: Security Tightened Around Women’s World Cup After Deadly Shooting in Auckland
description: The month-long, 32-team tournament is being co-hosted by New Zealand and Australia, both countries where there are strict gun laws and fatal shootings are rare.
